author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the grill to its highest setting. Place the scallops onto a baking sheet, top with the melted butter, chilli and breadcrumbs and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Place the tray under the grill and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until golden-brown. To serve, place the scallops onto a plate in their shells with the watercress placed alongside.
ingredients: 2 scallops, cleaned, left in their shells,  25g/1oz butter, melted,  ½ red chilli, chopped,  50g/1¾oz breadcrumbs,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  handful watercress
